This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

1. [City Council](https://www.marysvillewa.gov/264/City-Council)

Meetings are arranged by meeting type and date, with the most recent at the top of the list. Click Agenda, Agenda Packet, or Minutes to view the documents. Older meeting agendas and minutes can be found
here
.

Marysville Fire District Board of Directors meeting agendas and minutes can be found on the Fire District's website
here
.
